verses.verse: שִׁ֗יר <WH7892> Shir, A Song הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <WH4609> ham-Ma-'a-Lot of degrees בְּשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> be-Shuv turned again יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh When the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שִׁיבַ֣ת <WH7870> shi-Vat the captivity צִיּ֑וֹן <WH6726> tzi-Yon; of Zion הָ֝יִ֗ינוּ <WH1961> ha-Yi-nu, become כְּחֹלְמִֽים׃ <WH2492> ke-cho-le-Mim. we were like them that dream

אָ֤ז <WH227> 'az Then יִמָּלֵ֪א <WH4390> yim-ma-Le filled שְׂח֡וֹק <WH7814> se-Chok with laughter פִּינוּ֮ <WH6310> pi-Nu Then was our mouth וּלְשׁוֹנֵ֪נוּ <WH3956> u-le-sho-Ne-nu and our tongue רִ֫נָּ֥ה <WH7440> rin-Nah with singing אָ֭ז <WH227> 'az Then יֹאמְר֣וּ <WH559> yo-me-Ru then said בַגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> vag-go-Yim; they among the heathen הִגְדִּ֥יל <WH1431> hig-Dil great things יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot hath done עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with אֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> 'El-leh. another

הִגְדִּ֣יל <WH1431> hig-Dil great things יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot hath done עִמָּ֗נוּ <WH5973> 'im-Ma-nu, with הָיִ֥ינוּ <WH1961> ha-Yi-nu become שְׂמֵחִֽים׃ <WH8056> se-me-Chim. for us [whereof] we are glad

שׁוּבָ֣ה <WH7725> shu-Vah Turn again יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- ; שְׁבוּתֵנוּ she-vu-te-nu כשְׁבִיתֵ֑נוּ <WH7622> she-vi-Te-nu; captive קכַּאֲפִיקִ֥ים <WH650> ka-'a-fi-Kim as the streams בַּנֶּֽגֶב׃ <WH5045> ban-Ne-gev. in the south
הַזֹּרְעִ֥ים <WH2232> haz-zo-re-'Im They that sow בְּדִמְעָ֗ה <WH1832> be-dim-'Ah, in tears בְּרִנָּ֥ה <WH7440> be-rin-Nah in joy יִקְצֹֽרוּ׃ <WH7114> yik-Tzo-ru. shall reap

הָ֘ל֤וֹךְ <WH1980> ha-Loch forth יֵלֵ֨ךְ׀ <WH1980> ye-Lech to and fro וּבָכֹה֮ <WH1058> u-va-Choh and weepeth נֹשֵׂ֪א <WH5375> no-Se bearing מֶֽשֶׁךְ־ <WH4901> me-shech- precious הַ֫זָּ֥רַע <WH2233> haz-Za-ra' seed בֹּֽא־ <WH935> bo- shall doubtless יָב֥וֹא <WH935> ya-Vo come בְרִנָּ֑ה <WH7440> ve-rin-Nah; again with rejoicing נֹ֝שֵׂ֗א <WH5375> no-Se, bringing אֲלֻמֹּתָֽיו׃ <WH485> 'a-lum-mo-Tav. his sheaves
